name: BoundedIterator_hasNextTest
description: Unit tests for the hasNext method of the BoundedIterator class.

test_cases.name: testHasNextWithinBounds
test_cases.description: Tests the hasNext method when the iterator is within bounds.

test_cases.name: testHasNextOutOfBounds
test_cases.description: Tests the hasNext method when the iterator is out of bounds.

test_cases.name: testHasNextWithZeroMax
test_cases.description: Tests the hasNext method when the maximum number of elements to iterate over is zero.

test_cases.name: testHasNextWithNegativeOffset
test_cases.description: Tests the hasNext method when the offset is negative, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testHasNextWithNegativeMax
test_cases.description: Tests the hasNext method when the maximum number of elements to iterate over is negative, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
